LocalAdminAccount.title: Local Administrator Account
LocalAdminAccount.description: The account name of the local administrator account you would like to use with LAPS

DaysTillExpiration.title: Days till Expiration of LAPS Password
DaysTillExpiration.description: The amount of time in days until the password is expired and will change on a check-in (Default is 60 days)

PasswordLength.title: Length of the generated Password
PasswordLength.description: How long the generated password will be (Default is 12 characters)

PasswordGrouping.title: Length of each group of characters in password.
PasswordGrouping.description: Like Safari Style passwords, you can specify how many characters are used between each of the separators

PasswordSeparator.title: Password Separator to use
PasswordSeparator.description: Sepcify what string character you would like to use to sepearte each character group of passwords. Safari default and macOSLAPS defaults is -

RemoveKeychain.title: Remove the keychain for the local administrator
RemoveKeychain.description: If set to Yes, the keychain for the local adminsitrator will be deleted once the password has been changed (Default is Yes)

RemovePassChars.title: Remove these characters from the generated password
RemovePassChars.description: Any characters defined in this field will be removed from any generated password

ExclusionSets.title: Sets of characters to exclude
ExclusionSets.description: Any options defined here will remove that entire set of charcters from any generated password

PreferredDC.title: Preferred Domain Controller
PreferredDC.description: If defined, this server will be used when performing password changes. Useful when you have RODC (Read Only Domain Controllers)

FirstPass.title: First Password
FirstPass.description: Enter the password intially set to your administrator account that you want to use with LAPS that was created with a secureToken

Method.title: Method
Method.description: Select the preferred method to utilize macOSLAPS

PasswordRequirements.title: Password Requirements
PasswordRequirements.description: Specify in a dictionary what requirements you would like the password to have
